history.text: seen any good movies?
Yes, I have seen good movies and to be exact Despicable Me was excellent.
what kind of movie is it?
The Genre is Animation which the kids will love and the adults will smile with amusement
Are there any good actors doing the voices?

Yes, Steve Carrell plays Gru a mean supervillain, Jason Segel as Victor "Vector" Perkins Mr. Perkins' son and Gru's archenemy, and Russell Brand as Dr. Nefario Gru's elderly gadget man and a friendly scientist. It is hilarious with great voices from awesome actors and actress.
what is the plot of the movie?
Despicable Me is a 3D cartoon comedy of whiplash-quick laughs, funny punch lines and a wickedly gimmicky appreciation for 3D.
Is it for adults as well?
As a matter of fact, it is for adults as well its a family oriented movie. All adults will smile with amusement
Is it a long movie?
No, it is not long at all it is short, sweet-and-sour, and amusing rather than funny. Despicable Me can't help but be likable.
It is the right amount of time to enjoy a very likeable move
moviei
Is it a stand alone movie or are there more than one?
I am not sure about that but did you know it was released on July 9, 2010, in the United States. It is the debut film of Illumination Entertainment.
wow it's been out for awhile.
Is the story based off of a book?
Yes it has been out for a while.
I am not sure about that but how do you feel about seeing movies with a rating of 81% and average 6.8/10?
Sounds good i like good movies.
do you know who the director is?
That's great it's no first-rank CGI cartoon, but shows how Pixar's quality over crass is inspiring the mid-list. Fun, with teary bits, for kids; fresh and smart for adults.
Yes the directors are: Pierre Coffin and Chris Renaud
Awesome thanks i will have to check this movie out.
You are very welcome considering the fact that Villains so often steal the show in animation. Despicable Me smartly turns the whole operation over to megalomaniacal rogue Gru.
I think you will absolutely enjoy it
Sound like a nice change of pace i think i will as well.

And once again it does have teary bits for the kids but it may pull at your heartstrings as wells but there will be a lot of smiles and no one will be any different afterward than they were walking into the theater.
i always enjoy pixar movies.

uid1response.feedback: They gave a good explanation of the movie.
